erroGenerico: An error occurred. Please try again.
digiteEmailParaRedefinir: Enter your email to reset your password.
timeUpTitle: Your time ran out before finishing the questions!
encouragement:
No problem, what matters is that you tried. Go back to the map, Vest is waiting for you...
Maybe this time you’ll make it!
correctMessage:
WOW, right answer!
Vest is very
proud of you!
wrongMessage:
That wasn’t it...
You lost a life, but
Vest still
believes in you.
createAccount: Create an account to start your journey
speech:
Today's challenge is to 
answer a quiz in 
10 minutes
instructions:
You will return to the map and choose 
the indicated time to complete your quiz
startSubtitle: Create your account or log in to save your progress and continue your journey with Vest!

login.subtitulo: Please log in with your account

mapa.alertAtençãoMensagem: Choose a value between 1 and 60 minutes
mapa.alertTempoDesativadoMensagem: The timer has been successfully deactivated!
mapa.tooltipDesafio: Here you can access the daily challenge to quickly test your knowledge.
mapa.tooltipTempo: Activate the timer to control the limit during the quiz phases.

materia.segredo: Let me tell you a secret...
materia.segredoe: secret: click on one of the subjects.
materia.assuntosMaisFrequentes: Topics from {{nome}} that appear most frequently in the entrance exam

Filosofia.eticaPolitica: Ethics and Politics (ethical issues, political theories)

resumos.Geometry (plane and spatial): Geometry studies shapes, sizes, positions, and properties of space.
resumos.Algebra (functions, equations, systems): Algebra works with symbols and rules to manipulate expressions and equations.
resumos.Quantities and measurements (ratios, pro: Covers proportions, ratios, percentages, and measurements applied in daily life.
resumos.Statistics and Probability: Analyzes data, distributions, and probability calculations for events.
resumos.Graph Analysis and Basic Logic: Study of graphs, function interpretation, and logical reasoning.
resumos.Text Interpretation (reading and underst: Develops the ability to understand and interpret various texts.
resumos.Grammar (morphology, syntax, semantics): Studies the structure of the language, its rules, and meanings.
resumos.Literature (literary movements, book ana: Analysis of literary works and historical and cultural contexts.
resumos.Text comprehension (English or Spanish): Understanding texts in a foreign language with focus on meaning and inference.
resumos.Vocabulary and basic grammar: Learning words, expressions, and basic grammar rules.
resumos.Genetics and Evolution: Principles of heredity, DNA, and species evolution.
resumos.Ecology (environments, food chains): Study of relationships between living beings and the environment.
resumos.Cytology (cells, tissues): Structure and function of cells and tissues in living organisms.
resumos.Physiology (living beings, systems): Functioning of body systems and vital processes.
resumos.General Chemistry (equations, reactions): Basics of chemical reactions, equations, and fundamental chemistry laws.
resumos.Physical Chemistry (reactions, states of: Interaction between physical and chemical principles in reactions and state changes.
resumos.Organic Chemistry (structures, functions: Study of organic compounds, their structures, and chemical functions.
resumos.Mechanics (Newton’s laws, motion): Laws of motion, forces, energy, and everyday applications.
resumos.Thermology (temperature, heat): Study of temperature, heat, calorimetry, and energy transfer.
resumos.Optics (mirrors, lenses): Behavior of light, reflection, refraction, and image formation.
resumos.Wave Theory (waves, sound): Study of mechanical and sound waves, their properties and phenomena.
resumos.Electromagnetism (electromagnetic waves,: Study of electricity, magnetism, and electromagnetic waves.
resumos.History of Brazil: Timeline of Brazil from colonization to contemporary times.
resumos.General History (ancient, medieval): Main ancient and medieval civilizations and their legacies.
resumos.Modern and Contemporary Age: Events, revolutions, and social transformations of the Modern and Contemporary ages.
resumos.Geography of Brazil (economy, population: Study of Brazilian territory, population, economy, and regions.
resumos.Geopolitics (political geography, intern: Relations between countries, conflicts, agreements, and global politics.
resumos.Cartography (map reading, scales): Interpretation of maps, scales, coordinates, and cartographic projections.
resumos.Environment (environmental issues, susta: Environmental impacts, preservation, and sustainable practices.
resumos.Ancient Philosophy (Plato, Aristotle): Philosophical ideas and contributions of ancient thinkers.
resumos.Modern Philosophy (Descartes, Kant): Study of ideas and theories of modern philosophers.
resumos.Ethics and Politics (ethical issues, pol: Reflection on morality, ethics, and political organization of society.
resumos.Classical Sociology (Comte, Durkheim): Theories and concepts of classical sociology.
resumos.Culture and Society (identity, culture): How culture shapes identity and social relationships.
resumos.Citizenship (social issues, rights): Rights, duties, and citizen participation in society.

geometria.question: What is the sum of the internal angles of a triangle?

algebra.question: If x + 3 = 7, what is the value of x?

grandezas.question: If a shirt costs R$50 and has a 20% discount, what is the final price?

estatistica.question: What is the arithmetic mean of 2, 4, 6, 8?

analiseGrafica.question: What does the intersection point of two lines on a graph represent?

interpretacao.question: What is the main idea of a text?

gramatica.question: What is the function of a subject in a sentence?

compreensao.question: What does 'The cat is under the table' mean?
options: The cat is on the table
The cat is under the table
The cat is next to the table
The cat is in front of the table

vocabulario.question: What is the meaning of the word 'ancient'?

ecologia.question: What is a food chain?
options: Set of species in an ecosystem

citologia.question: Which organelle is responsible for energy production in the cell?

fisiologia.question: What is the main organ of the circulatory system?

geral.question: What is the chemical symbol for water?

fisico.question: Which state of matter has a defined shape and volume?

organica.question: Which functional group is present in alcohols?

mecanica.question: What is the formula of Newton's second law?

termologia.question: What is the SI unit of temperature?

optica.question: What does a converging lens do to light?

ondulatoria.question: What is the speed of sound in air at 20°C?

eletromagnetismo.question: What is the unit of electric current?

historiaBrasil.question: In what year did Brazil gain independence?

historiaGeral.question: Which civilization built the pyramids of Egypt?

idadeModerna.question: Which event marked the beginning of the Modern Age?

geografiaBrasil.question: What is the largest Brazilian biome?

geopolitica.question: What is the main body of the UN?

cartografia.question: What does the scale of a map indicate?

filosofiaModerna.question: Who said 'I think, therefore I am'?

sociologiaClassica.question: Who is considered the father of sociology?

cidadania.question: What is citizenship?
options: Rights and duties of an individual

slide1.title: Welcome to VestQuest!
slide1.description: I’m Vest, your fox guide on this journey to success!

slide2.title: How does VestQuest work?
slide2.description: Answer quizzes and unlock levels while learning for real!

slide3.title: Ready to walk the path to success?
slide3.description: Tap Play and join me on this epic journey!

outOfLivesMessage:
Making mistakes now is better than on exam day.
Try again — I’m sure next time you’ll succeed!

termsNConditions.title: Terms and Conditions of Use
termsNConditions.intro: By using this app, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully before using.

objective.title: 1. Purpose of the App
objective.content: Our app aims to help students preparing for the ENEM exam by offering a practical, fun, and efficient study platform.

usage.title: 2. Permitted Use
usage.content: You agree to use the app only for educational purposes, not to interfere with its functioning, and not to use it for commercial purposes without permission.

account.title: 3. User Account
account.content: By creating an account, you are responsible for keeping your information accurate. Do not share your account with others.

privacy.title: 4. Privacy and Data
privacy.content: Your data is securely stored and used only to improve your experience with the app.

intellectual.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content in the app is protected by copyright and may not be copied or distributed without permission.

updates.title: 6. App Modifications
updates.content: We may update or improve the app at any time, without prior notice.

responsibility.title: 7. Limitation of Responsibility
responsibility.content: The app is a support tool and does not guarantee success on the ENEM exam.

account_deletion.title: 8. Account Deletion
account_deletion.content: You can delete your account at any time. Accounts violating the terms may be suspended.

sections.acceptance: By continuing to use the app, you agree to these terms.

termsRequiredMessage: You need to accept the Terms of Use to continue.
rankingSemDados: You don't have any data recorded in your ranking yet. Press the button below to start recording.
